concept.description: Propagates dependencies declared by POM descriptors to artifacts.
concept.cypher: call apoc.periodic.iterate( "MATCH (pom:Effective:Pom), (pom)-[:DESCRIBES]->(artifact:Artifact), (pom)-[:DECLARES_DEPENDENCY]->()-[:TO_ARTIFACT]->(dependency:Artifact) WHERE artifact.type in $artifactTypes RETURN artifact, dependency", "MERGE (artifact)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(dependency)", { params: { artifactTypes: ["jar","war","ear"] } }) YIELD total as `Artifact Dependencies`

concept.description: Reports all POM descriptors declaring a direct dependency to any Log4j 2.x artifact.
concept.cypher: MATCH (:Repository)-[:CONTAINS_POM]->(pom:Pom), (pom)-[:DECLARES_DEPENDENCY]->()-[:TO_ARTIFACT]->(log4j:Artifact) WHERE log4j.group = "org.apache.logging.log4j" RETURN pom.fqn as POM, collect(log4j.fqn) as `Declared Log4j dependencies`

concept.description: Label artifacts of type WAR, EAR and Spring Boot fat JARs as "Deployable".
concept.cypher: MATCH (:Repository)-[:CONTAINS_ARTIFACT]->(deployable:Artifact) WHERE ( deployable.type in ["war","ear"] or (deployable)<-[:DESCRIBES]-(:Pom)-[:USES_PLUGIN]->(:Plugin)-[:IS_ARTIFACT]->(:Artifact{name:"spring-boot-maven-plugin"}) ) and not exists(deployable.classifier) SET deployable:Deployable RETURN deployable.fqn as Deployable

concept.description: Reports deployable artifacts having direct or indirect dependencies to Log4j core 2.x.
concept.cypher: MATCH (deployable:Deployable) // Uncomment if you want to restrict to deployable artifacts younger than a given timestamp // WHERE // deployable.lastModified > datetime('2021-01-01T00:00:00Z').epochMillis WITH deployable MATCH p = shortestPath((deployable)-[:DEPENDS_ON*]->(log4j:Artifact)) WHERE deployable <> log4j and log4j.fqn STARTS WITH 'org.apache.logging.log4j:log4j-core:' RETURN deployable.fqn as Deployable, collect(DISTINCT log4j.version) as `Log4j dependencies`
